name: TalliBaby
0:
”Alexa, ask Talli Baby when was Sarah's last dirty diaper”
”Alexa, tell Talli Baby that I gave Sarah a bottle of milk”
”Alexa, tell Talli Baby that I changed Sarah's wet diaper”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talli baby
des:
Track feedings, sleep, diapers, and more. Our clean and simple voice interface makes it easy to log events when your phone is not accessible. Real-time sync across devices and users means mom, dad, grandma, etc. see the same data from any device. 

With our companion skill, you can start and stop timers for breastfeeding (nursing), pumping, and sleep. You can also log bottle feedings, solid food feedings, and wet and dirty diapers. You can review the event in the mobile application to add additional details at any time. 

We are working hard to continuously improve our skill and application and we have many more features coming up soon! We’re committed to providing you a range of options for easy logging that fits into your life. 

Keep calm and care on!
The Talli Baby team

support@talli.me
https://talli.me
